EVID.rationale: All claims sourced from SEC filings, earnings calls, and peer-reviewed journals.

MECH.rationale: Lithography mechanism and yield physics documented at process node level.

INC.rationale: Customer concentration risk and capex incentive fully traced.

RISK.rationale: Geopolitical and yield risk quantified by scenario.

SPEC.rationale: All figures node-stamped, quarter-stamped, and source-attributed.
